function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of focus on health in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases spreading","Mitigation":"Integrate health-oriented approach in construction and built environment practices","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, air filtration systems","People":"Occupants, visitors, construction workers","Owner":"Architects, construction companies, building owners"},{"Description":"Failure to adapt to new regulations and guidelines","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to outdated practices","Mitigation":"Stay updated with new laws and guidelines, implement adaptive measures","Technologies":"Smart building technologies, IoT sensors for monitoring","People":"Regulators, construction industry stakeholders","Owner":"Industry associations, building developers"},{"Description":"Inadequate disaster and emergency management practices","Impact":"Heightened risk of disease outbreak during emergencies","Mitigation":"Implement adaptive planning approaches, train personnel for emergency response","Technologies":"Emergency communication systems, crisis management software","People":"Emergency responders, building occupants","Owner":"Emergency management agencies, building management teams"}]}
